title: Frontend Developer
description: Developed an enterprise-wide Design System with React components, migrated decade-old code to React with a UI/UX overhaul for the NZ web service, helped transition to micro-frontends with NX/tRPC, recruited and mentored talent from internship program, and taught UX at a biweekly guild.

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description: I've maintained 9 web applications, and spearheaded the React frontend and design for 5 of them. With support from two backend devs, these apps are optimized for desktop and mobile scanning, serving their internal lumber and home gardening operations. Notably, three projects yield annual savings surpassing $100,000.

title: Digital Marketing and Social Media Consultant
description: Provided coaching and comprehensive reports for over 10 non-profits to improve their UX, Branding, SEO, and their Digital Marketing initiatives.
